member.name: M:HidLibrary.HidDevice.ReadReportSync(System.Byte)
member.summary: Reads an input report from the Control channel. This method provides access to report data for devices that do not use the interrupt channel to communicate for specific usages.
member.param: The report ID to read from the device
member.returns: The HID report that is read. The report will contain the success status of the read request

member.name: M:HidLibrary.HidDevice.WriteReportSync(HidLibrary.HidReport)
member.summary: Handle data transfers on the control channel. This method places data on the control channel for devices that do not support the interupt transfers
member.returns: The result of the tranfer request: true if successful otherwise false

member.name: T:TeensySharp.SharpUploader
member.summary:
This class handles uploading of firmware images to the PJRC Teensy boards.
Workflow:
1) Get an empty firmware image by calling GetEmptyFirmwareImage.
2) Copy the bytes to be programmed into the image (either manually :-) or using the SharpHexFileParser)
3) Call "Upload" to programm the chip

member.name: F:TeensySharp.SharpUploader.BoardDefinitions
member.summary: Upload charactaristics for the PJRC boards as defined in Pauls "teensy_loader_cli.c" https://github.com/PaulStoffregen/teensy_loader_cli/blob/master/teensy_loader_cli.c The AddrCopy Action is used to copy the address bytes to the report Currently only Teensy3.1 was tested, please inform if you find any errors on the other boards
